meta.content: Tulare City School District serves students and is located in Tulare, CA.

img.h1: School Closure Learning Plan/Plan de Aprendizaje de Cierre de Escuela

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

strong.span: How long will schools remain closed?

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Due to the ongoing COVID-19 Pandemic, it has been decided that Tulare City School District will remain

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: . We understand this decision has a significant impact on our community, at this time we believe it is an appropriate response to help reduce the possible impact from further spread of the virus.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: The following criteria will be used to determine when Tulare City School District is to reopen for student attendance:

li.style: list-style-type: decimal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: The California State Shelter in Place Executive Order has been lifted.

li.style: list-style-type: decimal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

ol.li: The number of confirmed cases of COVID-19 in Tulare County and/or California has remained constant for a two-week period or declined.

li.style: list-style-type: decimal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: The directive to Social Distance has been removed by the State of California.

li.style: list-style-type: decimal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

ol.li: The limit of people placed on social gatherings has been removed by the State of California.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Together we can help to prevent exposure to COVID-19. Please continue using precautionary/preventive health measures, such as social distancing, frequent handwashing, the use of hand sanitizer, avoiding handshakes, refraining from touching your face, and staying home. Below are web addresses to agencies providing guidance.

a.span: Programa de Educación a Distancia Boletin para Padres

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

strong.span: How will TCSD provide continued education during the extended school closure?

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: TCSD has developed a comprehensive distance learning plan, we refer to as the “School Closure Learning Plan.”

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: #ffffff; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Let us start by defining what is meant by “distance learning.” Distance learning means instruction in which the student and instructor are in different locations. This may include interacting through the use of a computer, and/or delivering instruction through printed materials and check-in time with the teacher. TCSD is providing distance learning to students in two forms, digital and printed access to materials and assignments.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: TCSD is offering both platforms because neither the District nor the community is positioned to offer a fully online curriculum. Distance learning opportunities are designed to offset learning loss and help students focus on the essential knowledge and skills they will need to be successful when they are able to re-engage in a full educational program.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

strong.span: What are the components of the School Closure Learning Plan?

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Learning activities are organized by the teacher that are to be completed independently by students. Teachers will assist students in their learning through weekly check-ins and written assignment sheets. Teachers will prepare and post a short video message each week for students to provide information about the week’s assignments.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Learning will continue to take place through individualized Learning Activity Bundles (LABs) for students in preschool through 8th grade. LABs will be distributed every two weeks throughout the school closure. LABs are available in print and electronic versions. LABs contain activities to keep your child engaged in reading, writing, social studies, science, and physical education. 7th and 8th-grade students will also have activities included in their elective classes. Preschool Labs include activities to promote gross and fine motor skill development. Teachers will be checking in remotely with every child weekly to see how they are doing and to offer assistance. For more information please see our website

strong.span: How will English Learner support be provided?

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: English learners will receive designated and integrated English Language Development (ELD) as part of their educational curriculum. Teachers have the flexibility to determine how services will be provided remotely to best meet the needs of English learners in their classrooms. Teachers will determine where, when, and what the students receive in order to continue to make progress toward English language proficiency and meet grade-level academic achievement.

br.em: Debido a la actual pandemia de COVID-19, se ha decidido que el distrito escolar de la ciudad de Tulare permanecerá

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

em.span: . Entendemos que esta decisión tiene un impacto significativo en nuestra comunidad, en este momento creemos que es una respuesta adecuada para ayudar a reducir el posible impacto de una mayor propagación del virus.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

em.span: Los siguientes criterios se utilizarán para determinar cuándo se reabrirá el Distrito Escolar de la Ciudad de Tulare para la asistencia de los estudiantes:

li.style: list-style-type: decimal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

em.span: Se ha levantado la Orden Ejecutiva de Refugio en el Lugar del Estado de California.

li.style: list-style-type: decimal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre
li.em: El número de casos confirmados de COVID-19 en el condado de Tulare y / o California se mantuvo constante durante un período de dos semanas o disminuyó.

li.style: list-style-type: decimal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

em.span: La directiva de Distancia Social ha sido eliminada por el Estado de California.

li.style: list-style-type: decimal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre
li.em: El límite de personas colocadas en reuniones sociales ha sido eliminado por el Estado de California.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

em.span: Juntos podemos ayudar a prevenir exposición a COVID-19. Continúe utilizando medidas de salud preventivas, como distanciamiento social, lavarse los manos frecuente, uso de desinfectante para manos, evitar apretones de manos, evitar tocarse la cara y quedarse en casa. A continuación se encuentran las direcciones web de las agencias que brindan orientación.

strong.span: ¿Cómo proporcionará TCSD educación continua durante el cierre prolongado de la escuela?

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

em.span: TCSD ha desarrollado un plan integral de aprendizaje a distancia, al que nos referimos como el "Plan de aprendizaje para el cierre de la escuela".

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: #ffffff; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

em.span: Comencemos por definir qué se entiende por "aprendizaje a distancia". Aprendizaje a distancia significa instrucción en la cual el estudiante y el instructor se encuentran en diferentes lugares. Esto puede incluir la interacción mediante el uso de una computadora y/o la entrega de instrucciones a través de materiales impresos y el tiempo de registro con el maestro. TCSD está brindando educación a distancia a los estudiantes en dos formas, acceso digital e impreso a materiales y tareas.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

em.span: TCSD ofrece ambas plataformas porque ni el Distrito ni la comunidad están posicionados para ofrecer un plan de estudios completamente en línea. Aprendizaje oportunidades por distancia están diseñados para compensar la pérdida de aprendizaje y ayudar a los estudiantes se centran en el conocimiento y las habilidades que necesitan para tener éxito cuando son capaces de esencial volver a participar en un programa educativo completo.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
span.br: ¿Cuáles son los componentes del Plan de aprendizaje para el cierre de escuelas?

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

em.span: Comunicación

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

em.span: Actividades de aprendizaje son organizadas por el profesor que los alumnos deben completar de forma independiente. Los maestros ayudarán a los estudiantes en su aprendizaje a través de registros semanales y hojas de tareas escritas. Los maestros prepararán y publicarán un mensaje de video corto cada semana para los estudiantes que brinden información sobre las tareas de la semana.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

em.span: Aprendizaje de continuará teniendo lugar a través de paquetes de actividad de aprendizaje (LAB) individualizados para estudiantes desde preescolar hasta octavo grado. Los LAB se distribuirán cada dos semanas durante el cierre de la escuela. Los LAB están disponibles en versión impresa y electrónica. Los LAB contienen actividades para mantener a su hijo involucrado en lectura, escritura, estudios sociales, ciencias y educación física. Los estudiantes de 7º y 8º grado también tendrán actividades incluidas de sus clases electivas. Los laboratorios preescolares incluyen actividades para promover el desarrollo de habilidades motoras gruesas y finas. Los maestros se registran de manera remota con cada niño semanalmente para ver cómo están y para ofrecer asistencia. Para obtener más información, visite nuestro sitio web

em.span: Nuestra responsabilidad colectiva de proporcionar una educación equitativa y apropiada para nuestros estudiantes con necesidades especiales sigue vigente. span.br: ¿Cómo se proporcionará el apoyo para los estudiantes de inglés?

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

em.span: Los aprendices de inglés recibirán Desarrollo del Idioma Inglés (ELD) designado e integrado como parte de su plan de estudios educativo. Los maestros tienen la flexibilidad de determinar cómo se proporcionarán los servicios de forma remota para satisfacer mejor las necesidades de los estudiantes de inglés en sus clases . Los maestros determinarán dónde, cuándo y qué reciben los estudiantes para continuar progresando hacia el dominio del idioma inglés y cumplir con el rendimiento académico de nivel de grado.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
